First Steps

We assume you have the following software installed

  • PHP7.2 or greater with the minimum required extensions - Learn how to install PHP here
  • Composer - Learn how to install composer here
  • OpenSSL

Running the following commands from your project folder will get you started 

composer require andrevanzuydam\tina4php
composer exec tina4 initialize:run
composer start

You should be able to browse to http://localhost:7145

It can sometimes be frustrating to wait for the release. Install the bleeding edge 

  composer require andrevanzuydam/tina4php:dev-master
